Manu Febie

Hi, I develop web applications

Github YouTube

Who am I?

I entered the world of ones and zeros with my vocational education focussing on application development in The Netherlands in 2016, and moved to Jakarta in 2018 to study Computer Science at Bina Nusantara University International. Since then I have developed a great passion for web development. I also am big GNU/Linux geek and supporter of open source software.

View my projects here or on github. You can also watch me on YouTube
